entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -0.4°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: SW 31 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
